segments.text: Whew ! I had to wait for almost an hour to get to the front of the line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! Your calligraphy is very beautiful . It was worth the wait !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Today I'm writing a kind of poem called a Chinese couplet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is an especially famous one . It says " May the passing days bring you health and longevity . May this season of renewal find you basked in riches . "
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very nice . Is it for sale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I never sell my artwork .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Then what do you do with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I give it away . Here , this one is for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! Really ? Are you sure ? Now I'll have a lucky year !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Remember , real luck must be created ( by ) yourself , and then it cannot be given or taken away ...
segments.speaker: S2
